mapper.select: SELECT tv.violation_type_code, tv.violation_type_name FROM t_violation_type tv
SELECT tvs.violation_csys_code, tvs.violation_csys_name FROM t_violation_csys tvs
SELECT tvh.violation_hpys_code, tvh.violation_hpys_name FROM t_violation_hpys tvh
SELECT tvh.violation_hpzl_code, tvh.violation_hpzl_name, tvh.violation_hpzl_desc FROM t_violation_hpzl tvh

SELECT SUM(tmp.`count`) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(tv.violation_id) AS `count` FROM t_violation tv LEFT JOIN t_camera tc ON tv.camera_id = tc.camera_id LEFT JOIN t_site ts ON tc.site_id =ts.site_id LEFT JOIN t_road_seg trs ON trs.src_site_id = ts.site_id LEFT JOIN t_road tr ON tr.road_id = trs.road_id WHERE tv.hphm =#{hphm} AND road_name IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(tv.violation_id) AS `count` FROM t_violation tv LEFT JOIN t_camera tc ON tv.camera_id = tc.camera_id LEFT JOIN t_site ts ON tc.site_id =ts.site_id LEFT JOIN t_road_seg trs ON trs.dst_site_id = ts.site_id LEFT JOIN t_road tr ON tr.road_id = trs.road_id WHERE tv.hphm =#{hphm} AND road_name IS NOT NULL) AS tmp

SELECT tvt.violation_type_name AS wzlx, COUNT(tv.violation_id) AS `count` FROM t_violation tv LEFT JOIN t_violation_type tvt ON tvt.violation_type_code = tv.wzlx WHERE tv.hphm =#{hphm} GROUP BY tv.wzlx

SELECT SUBSTRING(tv.create_time, 1,4) AS `year`, COUNT(tv.violation_id) AS `count` FROM t_violation tv WHERE tv.hphm =#{hphm} GROUP BY SUBSTRING(tv.create_time, 1,4) ORDER BY SUBSTRING(tv.create_time, 1,4) DESC LIMIT 8

SELECT ts.site_name, IFNULL(p.counts, 0) as `count` FROM t_site ts LEFT JOIN t_camera tc ON ts.site_id = tc.site_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(tv.violation_id) counts, tv.camera_id FROM t_violation tv WHERE 1 = 1
AND tv.create_time > #{startTime}
AND #{endTime} > tv.create_time
AND category = 0
AND category = 1
GROUP BY tv.camera_id) p ON p.camera_id = tc.camera_id ORDER BY p.counts DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT distinct ts.site_name, IFNULL(p.count1,0) AS `count` FROM t_site ts LEFT JOIN t_camera tc ON ts.site_id = tc.site_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tv.camera_id, COUNT(tv.violation_id) AS count1 FROM t_violation tv GROUP BY tv.camera_id) p ON tc.camera_id = p.camera_id LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{amount}
SELECT COUNT(ts.site_id) FROM t_site ts

SELECT ts.site_name, ts.lng, ts.lat FROM t_site ts LEFT JOIN t_camera tc ON ts.site_id = tc.site_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(tv.violation_id) counts, tv.camera_id FROM t_violation tv WHERE 1 = 1
AND tv.create_time > #{startTime}
AND #{endTime} > tv.create_time
AND category = 0
AND category = 1
GROUP BY tv.camera_id) p ON p.camera_id = tc.camera_id ORDER BY p.counts DESC LIMIT 10
